hint_dist_user.name: chaos
hint_dist_user.description: A completely randomized hint distribution with single copies

Colossus (Spirit Temple).text: They say that plundering #Lon Lon Ranch# is a foolish choice.

DMC (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #50 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Green Rupee#.

DMC (Upper Grotto).text: They say that #Pierre atop the Fire Temple# hides #a Map of Jabu Jabu's Belly#.

DMT (Biggoron).text: They say that #Goron City# is on the way of the hero.

DMT (Storms Grotto).text: They say that amidst flames in #Kakariko Village#, Sheik gives #a Green Rupee#.

Dodongos Cavern (Bombable Wall).text: They say that slaying #30 Gold Skulltulas# reveals #a Gold Skulltula Token#.

GC (Maze).text: They say that the #Skull Mask and Mask of Truth# reward...^ #a Blue Rupee# and #the Shadow Medallion#.

GC (Medigoron).text: They say that the #Ocarina of Time# rewards both...^ #a Gold Skulltula Token# and #a Bow#.

GV (Waterfall).text: They say that ##the Haunted Wasteland## has #1# major item.

Graveyard (Shadow Temple).text: They say that #the Fire Temple# hoards #a Gold Skulltula Token#.
hinted_locations: Fire Temple Moving Fire Room Recovery Heart 3

HF (Southeast Grotto).text: They say that ##Zora's Domain## has #1# major item.

KF (Deku Tree Right).text: They say that the #Spirit Trial# was dispelled by Sheik.
